      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Direction of reflected waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung der reflektierten Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Direction des vagues reflétées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sentido de ondas refletidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Senso delle onde riflesse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατεύθυνση των απεικονισμένων κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dirección de ondas reflejadas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The wave front diagram illustrates the direction of the reflected plane wave ripples with respect to the angle of incidence of the waves.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">incidence angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plane wave propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plane wave reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plane waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave ripples</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Welle Frontseite Diagramm veranschaulicht die
Richtung der reflektierten flache Welle Kräuselung in Bezug auf den 
Einfallswinkel der Wellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le diagramme de front d'onde illustre la 
direction de l'ondulation reflétée d'onde plane en ce qui concerne 
l'angle d'incidence des vagues.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O diagrama da parte dianteira de onda ilustra o 
sentido do ripples refletido da onda plana com respeito ao ângulo de 
incidência das ondas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo schema della parte anteriore di onda illustra 
il senso dell'ondulazione riflessa dell'onda piana riguardo all'angolo
dell'incidenza delle onde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μπροστινό διάγραμμα κυμάτων επεξηγεί την 
κατεύθυνση των απεικονισμένων κυματώσεων επίπεδων κυμάτων όσον 
αφορά τη γωνία της πρόσπτωσης των κυμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El diagrama del frente de onda ilustra la 
dirección de la ondulación reflejada de la onda plana con respecto 
al ángulo de la incidencia de las ondas.</string>
          </description>
